scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:client" "npm run dev:server" "bun --watch run ./dist/server/index.js"
scripts.build:app: mkdir -p dist/client && bun run build:client && bun run build:server && cp client/*.html client/*.css ./dist/client && mkdir -p dist/client/client && cp dist/lib/lib.js dist/client/client/lib.js
scripts.demo: bun run build && bun run demo-dev
scripts.build:lib:js: bun build ./client/lib.ts --outdir ./dist/lib --target browser --format esm --external lit --external lit-element --external lit-html --external xinjs --external html2canvas
scripts.build:lib:bundled: bun build ./client/lib.ts --outdir ./dist/lib-bundled --target browser --format esm && cp -r dist/lib/client dist/lib-bundled/ && echo '{"name": "@anssipiirainen/sc-charts", "main": "lib.js", "types": "client/lib.d.ts", "type": "module"}' > dist/lib-bundled/package.json
scripts.build:lib: rm -rf dist/lib && npm run build:lib:js && npm run build:lib:types
scripts.build:lib:with-bundled: npm run build:lib && npm run build:lib:bundled
scripts.update:linked: bun run build:lib:bundled && echo 'Bundled build complete - linked projects can now see changes'
scripts.build: npm run build:lib && npm run build:app
